sourcesContent:
import { cofounders } from '../data/co-founders'
import { Grid, Card, CardMedia, CardContent, Typography } from '@mui/material'

const AboutUs = () => (
  <>
    <Typography variant="h4" mt={5} mb={3}>About Us</Typography>
    <Typography paragraph>
      Odyssey of Wisdom is a youth association that connects Greek youth with Erasmus+ opportunities, promoting learning and cultural exchange throughout Europe.
    </Typography>

    <Grid container spacing={4} mt={2}>
      {founders.map((person) => (
        <Grid item xs={12} sm={6} md={4} key={person.name}>
          <Card>
            <CardMedia component="img" height="200" image={person.image} alt={person.name} />
            <CardContent>
              <Typography variant="h6">{person.name}</Typography>
              <Typography variant="subtitle2" color="text.secondary">{person.role}</Typography>
              <Typography variant="body2" mt={1}>{person.bio}</Typography>
            </CardContent>
          </Card>
        </Grid>
      ))}
    </Grid>
  </>
)

export default AboutUs
